answers.answer: Also- What test do I  take to determine if I have Type 1 diabetes?
what med ? what dose ?ask for the following  tests , FT3 , anti TGab ,anti TPOab !

You need a Glucose Tolerance Fasting Test done (bloods) and also need to get yr meds revised by your Doc.A TSH of 8.38 isnt serious as some have been over 100.0 but you do need to see your Doc in regards to adjusting meds.

question: I have questions about a recent Thyroid test: MyTSH 8.38T4 FREE 1.07Last year my TSH was .80.. How could it jump this high and I am danger? I take a tyroid med right now. Can anyone give me advise on what steps I need to take now? Thanks in advance for any assistance!
title: THROID HIGH AT 8.38
